per_frame_init_1=count1 = .875;
per_frame_init_2=count2 = .625;
per_frame_init_3=count3 = .375;
per_frame_init_4=count4 = .125;
per_frame_1=step = (.25+.5*bass_att)/fps;
per_frame_2=
per_frame_3=count1 = if(below(count1,1),count1+step,count1-1);
per_frame_4=count2 = if(below(count2,1),count2+step,count2-1);
per_frame_5=count3 = if(below(count3,1),count3+step,count3-1);
per_frame_6=count4 = if(below(count4,1),count4+step,count4-1);
per_frame_7=
per_frame_8=q1 = count1;
per_frame_9=q2 = count2;
per_frame_10=q3 = count3;
per_frame_11=q4 = count4;
per_frame_12= 
per_frame_13=warp = .075;
per_frame_14=
per_pixel_1=wave1 = above(rad,q1)*below(rad,q1+.1);
per_pixel_2=wave2 = above(rad,q2)*below(rad,q2+.1);
per_pixel_3=wave3 = above(rad,q3)*below(rad,q3+.1);
per_pixel_4=wave4 = above(rad,q4)*below(rad,q4+.1);
per_pixel_5=
per_pixel_6=wave = wave1+wave2+wave3+wave4;
per_pixel_7=
per_pixel_8=sx = 1.025-.05*wave;
per_pixel_9=sy = 1.025-.05*wave;
per_pixel_10=
per_pixel_11=zoom = 1+.05*above(rad,rand(100)*.01);
per_pixel_12=
per_pixel_13=warp = .5*bass_att*above(rad,.5*treb_att);
warp_1=`shader_body
warp_2=`{
warp_3=`    float1 d = 0.0009;
warp_4=`    float1 dx = ( GetBlur2(uv + float2(d,0)) - GetBlur2(uv-float2(d,0)) ).y;
warp_5=`    float1 dy = ( GetBlur2(uv + float2(0,d)) - GetBlur2(uv-float2(0,d)) ).y;
warp_6=`    float2 my_uv = uv - float2(dx,dy)*0.01;
warp_7=`
warp_8=`
warp_9=`
warp_10=`    float2 v = 0.01;
warp_11=`    ret.y = tex2D( sampler_fc_main, my_uv-floor(my_uv)).y;
warp_12=`
warp_13=`    
warp_14=`    ret.y += (ret.y - GetBlur3(my_uv-floor(my_uv)).y)*.1;
warp_15=`    ret.y += 0.006;//-GetBlur3(uv-floor(uv)).x*5;
warp_16=`
warp_17=`    ret.y = lerp( ret.y, lum(ret).x, 0);
warp_18=`ret.x = ret.y;
warp_19=`ret.z = ret.y;
warp_20=`
warp_21=`//--------------------------------
warp_22=`
warp_23=`    d = 0.01;
warp_24=`    my_uv = float2(-dy,dx)*0.05;
warp_25=`
warp_26=`//    dx = ( GetBlur2(uv + float2(d,0)) - GetBlur2(uv-float2(d,0)) ).z;
warp_27=`//    dy = ( GetBlur2(uv + float2(0,d)) - GetBlur2(uv-float2(0,d)) ).z;
warp_28=`  //  my_uv += uv - float2(dx,dy)*0.005;
warp_29=`
warp_30=`
warp_31=`
warp_32=`    v = 0.01;
warp_33=`//    ret.z =tex2D( sampler_fw_main, my_uv - floor(my_uv)).z;
warp_34=`
warp_35=`    
warp_36=`  //  ret.z += (ret.z - GetBlur3(my_uv-floor(my_uv)).z)*0.13;
warp_37=`    //ret.z *= 0.95;
warp_38=`//    ret.z += 0.03-GetBlur3(uv-floor(uv)).x - tex2D( sampler_main, my_uv - floor(my_uv)).y*0.05;
warp_39=`
warp_40=`//    ret.x = tex2D( sampler_main, uv).x * 0.003;
warp_41=`
warp_42=`}
comp_1=`shader_body
comp_2=`{
comp_3=`    ret = .9*tex2D(sampler_main, uv).xyz;
comp_4=`    ret += .5*GetBlur1(uv)+.1*GetBlur3(uv);
comp_5=`    ret = lerp(ret,.8-saturate(GetPixel(uv)+.5*GetBlur1(uv)),2*rad-.45);
comp_6=`    ret *= ret;
comp_7=`}
